cycleparking.name: Cycle parking
cycleparking.description: Photos of parked cycles, on racks, railings, in shelters. Or photos of cycle racks themselves.

obstructions.name: Obstruction
obstructions.description: A narrow place, difficult for cycles to pass.

track.name: Track
track.description: A track or path other than a cycleway mainly for walking

carstorage.name: Car storage
carstorage.description: Issues relating to the storage of motor vehicles in the public realm.

closure.name: Temporary closure
closure.description: A route temporarily barred to cycle access.

roadworks.name: Roadworks
roadworks.description: A place where cyclists will be delayed or need to take extra care, but they can still pass.

bikeshops.name: Bike shop
bikeshops.description: A place where you can buy bikes or get them fixed.

potholes.name: Pothole
potholes.description: A hole in the ground to avoid.

destinations.name: Destination
destinations.description: A place where you might want to visit.

routesigns.name: Route sign
routesigns.description: A sign, usually on the cycleway network, indicating a route for cycling.

congestion.name: Congestion
congestion.description: A place where cyclists will be delayed or need to take extra care, but they can still pass.

bicycles.name: Bicycle
bicycles.description: A photo of a bicycle. Usually some interesting bike, eg. recumbent, basket or trailer, or even rider.

bad.name: Problem
bad.description: A problem that needs to be fixed
